description: Stylesheet defining CSS variables and styles for a React application's user interface, including themes and responsive design elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styling with center alignment and theme-based colors.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo including animation and size.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application, accommodating flexbox for layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the app with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, appearance, and hover effects.
